autho.title: Animal Feeding Automation
autho.description: The app by Cyclone team uses advanced machine learning technologies to simplify record-keeping and improve efficiency for farmers and feedlot managers.

about.label: About Us
about.heading: Innovative Solution for Agriculture
about.description1: We, students of TSI College, as part of a final interdisciplinary project in partnership with Reina-Kench meat processing plant, are developing a mobile app that fully automates animal feeding record-keeping.
about.description2: This innovative solution is designed for farmers, feedlots, and meat processing plants to simplify daily operations and increase productivity. Our app aims to make feeding records accurate, fast, and convenient, eliminating the need for manual record-keeping.

problem.label: Problem
problem.heading: Why Manual Record-Keeping is Inefficient
problem.keyIssuesDesc: Currently, animal feeding records on farms and feedlots are maintained manually. This requires significant time investment and often leads to errors that can negatively impact feeding results.
problem.issue1: Time wasted on manual data entry and processing
problem.issue2: High likelihood of errors in manual records
problem.issue3: Difficulty in data analysis and forecasting
problem.issue4: Reduced profits due to suboptimal feeding plans

ourSolve.label: Solution
ourSolve.heading: How We Solve the Problem
ourSolve.description: We are creating a mobile app that helps automate cattle and sheep feeding records. Now, all data—from diet to weight gain—can be easily entered into the app, which stores the information, analyzes it, and generates reports.

advantages.title: Solution Benefits
advantages.desc1: Up to 85% reduction in record-keeping time thanks to automation.
advantages.desc2: Data accuracy reaches 95% using ML algorithms.
advantages.desc3: Up to 30% increase in feeding productivity through diet optimization.
advantages.desc4: Full process automation, eliminating human error.

1.title: Diet Optimization
1.description: Data analysis to create an optimal diet that maximizes weight gain.

2.title: Automated Records
2.description: Complete elimination of manual data entry, minimizing errors.

3.title: Forecasting
3.description: ML algorithms predict feeding outcomes for better planning.

4.title: Real-time Analytics
4.description: Instant reports and graphs for decision-making.

1.title: Data Collection
1.description: Farmers input data about animals, diet, and living conditions via the app.

2.title: Data Analysis
2.description: ML algorithms process the data and provide optimization recommendations.

3.title: Reports & Graphs
3.description: The app generates visual reports for progress tracking.

4.title: Forecasting
4.description: Weight gain predictions and cost optimization based on data.

cta.heading: Try Our Solution
cta.description: Download the app and start automating feeding records today.

investment.title: Invest in the Future of Agriculture
investment.description: Cyclone is a high-growth-potential startup offering an innovative solution for feeding automation. We are seeking investors ready to support our product scaling.

item3.title: Team
item3.desc: Experts with IT and agriculture experience.

importance.label: Why It Matters
importance.heading: The Value of Automation
importance.need: Manual record-keeping hinders farm development, reducing efficiency and profits. Automation solves these issues, ensuring accuracy and time savings.
importance.benefit2: Improved feeding quality with accurate data.
importance.conclusion: Feeding automation is a step toward greater farm competitiveness and sustainability.

innovation.label: Innovation
innovation.heading: Technologies We Use
innovation.mlDesc: ML algorithms analyze data and provide diet and feeding recommendations.
innovation.cloudDesc: Cloud-based data storage and processing for access anywhere.
innovation.analyticsDesc: In-depth data analytics for informed decisions.
innovation.digitalDesc1: Our app digitizes traditional record-keeping, making the process convenient and transparent.
innovation.digitalDesc2: Integration with cloud services and ML technologies ensures accuracy and scalability.

contact.label: Contact Us
contact.heading: Ready to Collaborate?
contact.description: Fill out the form or contact us directly to discuss investments, partnerships, or using our app.
